Rows.Name: Level1Unlock
Rows.TooltipText: NSLOCTEXT("D_TimelineRanks", "Level1Unlock-TooltipText", "Learn to survive in the wilderness of Icarus. Explore more docile parts of the planet, but the danger is still real.")

Rows.Name: FactionContracts
Rows.TooltipText: NSLOCTEXT("D_TimelineRanks", "FactionContracts-TooltipText", "With experience under your belt, take on challenging contracts from competing factions with high rewards.")

Rows.Name: HarsherEnvironments
Rows.TooltipText: NSLOCTEXT("D_TimelineRanks", "HarsherEnvironments-TooltipText", "You can now sign up for contracts that expose you to severe weather conditions, putting your shelter and safety at risk.")

Rows.Name: ExoticProspecting
Rows.TooltipText: NSLOCTEXT("D_TimelineRanks", "ExoticProspecting-TooltipText", "You now have access to freelance prospects. Explore for exotics, undertaking vast journeys, where your survival is not guaranteed.")

Rows.Name: ReducedPlanetaryRestrictions
Rows.TooltipText: NSLOCTEXT("D_TimelineRanks", "ReducedPlanetaryRestrictions-TooltipText", "New regions of Icarus are available, but failed terraforming has left some regions far more dangerous than others. Expect greater challenges to your survival.")

Rows.Name: RemovedAllPlanetaryRestrictions
Rows.TooltipText: NSLOCTEXT("D_TimelineRanks", "RemovedAllPlanetaryRestrictions-TooltipText", "The entire terrazone of Icarus is opened to you. Extreme storms can threaten the strongest bases, and savage predators roam freely.")

Rows.Name: RemoteProspects
Rows.TooltipText: NSLOCTEXT("D_TimelineRanks", "RemoteProspects-TooltipText", "You have proven your ability to survive on Icarus, and may now take contracts in areas where orbital coverage is limited. Very little is known about the terraforming in these zones. Do not expect drop pod respawns, and attempting these prospects alone is not recommended.")
